name: $value
desc: The slices are differentiated by the presence or absence of the nominated element

name: $exists
desc: The slices have different values in the nominated element, as determined by testing them against the applicable ElementDefinition.pattern[x]

name: $pattern
desc: The slices are differentiated by type of the nominated element to a specifed profile

name: $type
desc: The slices are differentiated by conformance of the nominated element to a specifed profile
